name: smt-anchor-img
label: 锚点图片
codeSnap:
<smt-anchor-img
         mode="widthFix"
        url="{{img}}"
        origin-width="{{originWidth}}"
        origin-height="{{originHeight}}"
        max-font-count="5"
        list="{{list}}"
        bind:active="activeAnchorImg"
    ></smt-anchor-img>

demoCode.s:
<view class="container">
      <anchor-img 
        mode="widthFix"
        url="{{img}}"
        origin-width="{{originWidth}}"
        origin-height="{{originHeight}}"
        max-font-count="5"
        list="{{list}}"
        bind:active="activeAnchorImg"
    ></anchor-img>
</view>

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: 锚点图片模式（目前只支持widthFix和aspectFit）

attributes.name: maxFontCount
attributes.description: 允许显示的标签最大字数，多余省略;position为空时用于计算左右方向

attributes.name: textColor
attributes.description: 锚点文本颜色（目前只支持hex）

attributes.name: roundSize
attributes.description: 锚点圆直径,与锚点连线长度一致
